updates.contents: Our engineers have resolved the issue preventing successful git-pushes to Bamboo apps.
updates.title: Git-push Deploys on Bamboo

updates.contents: Our engineers have isolated the issue with git-push deployments on the Bamboo stack. Error rates are stabilizing and most Bamboo deploys are successful.
updates.title: Git-push Deploys on Bamboo

updates.contents: We're seeing elevated error rates with git-push deploys to applications on the Bamboo stack. Git-push deploys to Cedar are functioning normally.
updates.title: Git-push Deploys on Bamboo

updates.contents: Our automated systems have detected potential platform errors.  We are investigating.
updates.title: Potential Platform Issues
